extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC PCS neo
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC PCS neo to V5.0 Update 1 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SINEC NMS and UMC
extracted_playbook.description: Update SINEC NMS to V3.0 SP2 or later version and UMC to V2.15 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Siemens Customer Support
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Siemens customer support to receive patch and update information.

extracted_playbook.title: Filter Ports 4002 and 4004
extracted_playbook.description: Filter the Ports 4002 and 4004 to only accept connections to/from the IP addresses of machines that run UMC and are part of the UMC network using an external firewall.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Port 4004
extracted_playbook.description: If no RT server machines are used, block Port 4004 completely.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, following CISA's guidance and best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
